review: Work's great..looking r that I can take it with me.

review: Works great! Will probably get another one for the TV upsyairs!

review: I love it, huge improvement over Chromecast!
author: Barbara Schilling

review: Works really well! Only problem is it only allows you to download approved/offered apps by Amazon. Cannot search for other apps. Cannot download HBO GO.
author: Zach E Martin

review: Absolutely love it!  It's easy to install and set up. I like the flexibility and choice of programming. The love the high resolution of 1080P. Just wish new movies were added more frequently.
author: DAWNA

review: nice option to quickly link to amazon prime, hulu+, Netflix & more.  Just needs a reliable wifi to avoid interruption.
author: Jennifer E Barbezat

review: Perfect I looooove it I cancelled my cable ad soon as I tried it out!
author: abi

review: It's still new and we are still figuring it all out. But it does come up that it can't load something or say that it there was problem and we can't watch something on Netflix.  It's better than nothing but no perfect.
author: Torie B.
